price: Mose maame ka kyerεε Mose nua baa (Mar’yam) sε: “Di n'akyi”. Enti ͻkͻtεε baabi akyirikyiri hwεe, abrε a na wͻnnim (deε εrekͻsoͻ).
arabic: وَقَالَتۡ لِأُخۡتِهِۦ قُصِّيهِۖ فَبَصُرَتۡ بِهِۦ عَن جُنُبٖ وَهُمۡ لَا يَشۡعُرُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: waqālat li-ukh'tihi quṣṣīhi fabaṣurat bihi ʿan junubin wahum lā yashʿurūna
